about_the_game:
OBA DOBA is a Roguelike RTS/Tower Defense game. Inspired by the likes of They Are Billions, Starcraft, and Vampire Survivors, the experience boils down to frantic macro and micro of your Oba Dobas, structures, and upgrade choices in real time. Gableebin.

Features

  • Embark on randomly generated campaigns and maps to defeat the grand evils. Each map has a unique objective, so planning your journey will be important!
  • Control a powerful hero to lead your forces, similar to a MOBA hero.
  • Build towers and barracks to defend your base as well as go on the offensive.
  • Manage your workers, army, and buildings in real time. Let the *really really smart AI* control your infantry or select and micro them to get the most out of them. It's up to you!
  • Gain experience and then level up! Choose powerful upgrades and relics to form your build.
  • The enemies are ceaseless and evergrowing, so the 'real time' portion of the real time strategy is greatly emphasized.

  • Build towers and barracks to defend your base as well as go on the offensive.

name: OBA DOBA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th generation (probably older as well)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: dedicated graphics card recommended but not required

short_description: OBA DOBA is a Roguelike RTS/Tower Defense that is fast, funny, and frantic. Defend your base with towers and fighters while managing your resources and upgrades. Build up your arsenal of structures, abilities, and passives to defeat the evils that await. Build, rebuild, and survive! (hopefully)
